title: Justin Bieber is the latest celeb to be sued for posting a picture of himself
text:
Justin Bieber is the latest celeb to be sued for posting a picture of himself

Cape Town - Just a week after actress and singer Jennifer Lopez found herself on the wrong side of the law after posting a picture of herself and her fiancé without permission, Justin Bieber finds himself in the same situation.

READ MORE: Jennifer Lopez sued for R2m after using picture of herself and A-Rod without permission

According to E! Online, the Love Yourself hitmaker is being sued by photographer Robert Barbera for copyright infringement over a picture he posted to Instagram.

In court documents obtained by the publication, the singer is being accused of not licensing the photograph.

"Barbera is the author of the Photograph and has at all times been the sole owner of all right, title and interest in and to the Photograph, including the copyright thereto," the documents read.

"Bieber did not license the Photograph from Barbera for his Instagram page, nor did he have Barbera's permission or consent to publish."

READ MORE: Justin Bieber dropping a new album later this year

Although he is being sued, Bieber is yet to remove the picture from his page. (See it here)

(Sources: E! Online, DRUM)
description: Justin Bieber is sued by photographer Robert Barbera for copyright infringement over a picture he posted to Instagram.
